name: Angry Penguins: Snow Birds Rio
description:
This is a game completely based on physics and 3d architecture. This game allows the player to interact with the cute penguins and then play an adventure game that you will come to know after playing it!

The penguins are Really angry!!

This game is really helpful for physics assessing skills and is really meant for all age groups!

Download this adventurous game and rate our game on the App Store now!
